message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. My initial offer is $14000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14000 is a bit too steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, which I believe is still a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. My revised offer is $12500 for the product. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering its value to you.
